ovdesc.p: The AM.CCY.HEDGE.DETAIL application allows the viewing and amendment of the proposed FOREX trades determined by the cash management service.
The records created are a result of the processing of AM.CCY.HEDGE.REQUEST records.

desc.p: This field holds the ID of the detail record
This field canot be modified.
This field holds the proposed forward rate to be used for FOREX orders
This value will only be filled if an external user routine can provide this information.
This field cannot be modified.
This field holds the trade date that is to be used for resulting FOREX orders.
This field cannot be modified.
This field is part of the additional criteria field set that can be used to further restrict the selection of portfolios for processing by the cash management service.
This field cannot be modified.
This field contains the exchange rate returned from an external system
This field contains the total exposure. This is calculated as the total exposed currency, forecast and position.
NOTE : The minimum cash amount is not included in this calculation as it only affects the calculation of the Spot leg of a Swap operation.
This value is expressed in the exposure currency.
This field cannot be modified.
This field holds the customer ID identified by the cash management service.
This field cannot be modified.
This field is part of a multivalued set allowing restriction of portfolio valuation to specific asset/sub-asset combinations.

This field contains the number of working days in the future to be included when checking for cash flows resulting from equity dividends.
This field cannot be modified.

This field determines whether the accounts identified by the traded currency will have excess cash swept into the counter currency account (a Sell operation) or will have a shortfall met by the transfer of funds from the traded currency account (a Buy operation)

This field cannot be modified.
